forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind around 9 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun paints Downtown San Francisco in warm hues, offering a mild contrast to the usual chill of the bay. While the temperature dances near the 70-degree mark, a gentle west-southwest wind whispers through the city streets, easing the crispness that can linger. Light clouds drift lazily across the sky, but they do little to obscure the clarity of the day; instead, they create a soft interplay of light and shadow that enhances the landscape. Though the cool embrace of the marine layer may linger at the coast, the heart of the city basks in refreshing sunlight.

As evening approaches, the mercury will settle around 52, hinting at the arrival of a cool night. Dressing in layers is prudent; a lightweight jacket over a comfortable top will guard against any chill that might creep in as the sun descends. The weather invites simple pleasures—a stroll along the waterfront, where the golden reflections on the water mirror the fading light, or perhaps a leisurely visit to a cozy café for a warm drink, allowing the day to wind down gently. Moments spent in the company of friends or in quiet contemplation under the expanding blanket of night will resonate with the beauty of the lingering day.
